text: Provide trig functions that operate on units::Radians.

success_criteria.text: Implement the sin() function using units::Radians.
Implement the cos() function using units::Radians.
Implement the tan() function using units::Radians.

text: Provide trig functions that operate on units::Degrees.

Implement the tan() function using units::Degrees.

text: Provide inverse functions that return units::Radians.

success_criteria.text: Implement the asin2() function return units::Radians.
Implement the acos2() function return units::Radians.
Implement the atan2() function return units::Radians.
